description.value:
You move as fast and as high as the wind itself. You're permanently @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened].

You can use your extra action to Stride or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Leap], to provide one of the actions needed for a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.High Jump] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump]
